column4: I have problems getting my PC, with Kubuntu, connected to my Wireless LAN. I know that it works without problems in Gnome. When trying to set WEP key and Hex it seems it does not save the data and I can't connect. Anywhere else I can put that data so it's permanent, and working, in the system?
that should be a good starting point, also fwiw, you can use s:key-string-here instead of the hex of the key, if needed (tho i dont personally)
